LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_Setting: Before disabling, switch all mechanoid modes to vanilla. A restart is required to apply the settings.
LanguageData.WVC_Label_EscortIfEnemyWorkAndRecharge: Escort if enemy, work and recharge
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_BonusSetting: Bonus mode. It is disabled by default. Enabling is compatible with saves.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableShutdownSearching: If enabled, mechanoids will search for a spot before shutdown.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableEnemySearching: If enabled, in safe modes, mechanoids will check the map for enemies.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableSearchingWarning: If you don't understand what this option does, leave it enabled.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableShutdownForAllMechanoi: If enabled, idle optimization will also affect vanilla modes.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableSmartChargingForAllMec: If enabled, then the mechanoids will go to charge when they are not busy with anything, and not only when the charge runs out.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_VanillaModeOptimizationWarni: Does not affect combat mechanoids, as their idle has been replaced with a simulated patrol.
